data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: It is vain to say human beings ought to be satisfied with tranquility; they must have action; and they will make it if they cannot find it.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Let your performance do the thinking.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: I don't call you handsome, sir, though I love you most dearly: far too dearly to flatter you. Don't flatter me.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: If you are cast in a different mould to the majority, it is no merit of yours: Nature did it.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Cheerfulness, it would appear, is a matter which depends fully as much on the state of things within, as on the state of things without and around us.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: I'm just going to write because I cannot help it.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity, or registering wrongs.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Look twice before you leap.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Memory in youth is active and easily impressible; in old age it is comparatively callous to new impressions, but still retains vividly those of earlier years.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Consistency, madam, is the first of Christian duties.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: The soul, fortunately, has an interpreter - often an unconscious, but still a truthful interpreter - in the eye.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Give him enough rope and he will hang himself.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Men judge us by the success of our efforts. God looks at the efforts themselves.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: True enthusiasm is a fine feeling whose flash I admire where-ever I see it.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: If all the world hated you, and believed you wicked, while your own conscience approved you, and absolved you from guilt, you would not be without friends.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: The human heart has hidden treasures, In secret kept, in silence sealed; The thoughts, the hopes, the dreams, the pleasures, Whose charms were broken if revealed.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: I am always easy of belief when the creed pleases me.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Life is so constructed, that the event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: You know full well as I do the value of sisters' affections: There is nothing like it in this world.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: I try to avoid looking forward or backward, and try to keep looking upward.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: I feel monotony and death to be almost the same.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Conventionality is not morality.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Better to be without logic than without feeling.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: If we would build on a sure foundation in friendship, we must love friends for their sake rather than for our own.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Who has words at the right moment?

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: It is in vain to say human beings ought to be satisfied with tranquility: they must have action; and they will make it if they cannot find it.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: Prejudices, it is well known, are most difficult to eradicate from the heart whose soil has never been loosened or fertilized by education; they grow firm there, firm as weeds among stones.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: You had no right to be born; for you make no use of life. Instead of living for, in, and with yourself, as a reasonable being ought, you seek only to fasten your feebleness on some other person's strength.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.en: There is only one difference between a madman and me. I am not mad.
